   20: 
   21: -module(trace_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Tests the trace BIF.
   25: %%%
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          link_receive_call_correlation/0,
   32:          receive_trace/1, link_receive_call_correlation/1, self_send/1,
   33: 	 timeout_trace/1, send_trace/1,
   34: 	 procs_trace/1, dist_procs_trace/1, procs_new_trace/1,
   35: 	 suspend/1, suspend_exit/1, suspender_exit/1,
   36: 	 suspend_system_limit/1, suspend_opts/1, suspend_waiting/1,
   37: 	 new_clear/1, existing_clear/1, tracer_die/1,
   38: 	 set_on_spawn/1, set_on_first_spawn/1, cpu_timestamp/1,
   39: 	 set_on_link/1, set_on_first_link/1,
   40: 	 system_monitor_args/1, more_system_monitor_args/1,
   41: 	 system_monitor_long_gc_1/1, system_monitor_long_gc_2/1, 
   42: 	 system_monitor_large_heap_1/1, system_monitor_large_heap_2/1,
   43: 	 system_monitor_long_schedule/1, system_monitor_long_message_queue/1,
   44:          system_monitor_long_message_queue_ignore/1,
   45: 	 bad_flag/1, trace_delivered/1, trap_exit_self_receive/1,
   46:          trace_info_badarg/1, erl_704/1, ms_excessive_nesting/1]).
   47: 
   48: -nifs([slow_nif/0]).
   49: 
   50: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   51: 
   52: %%% Internal exports
   53: -export([process/1]).
   54: 
   55: -undef(line).
   56: -define(line, erlang:display(?LINE)).
   57: 
   58: suite() ->
   59:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   60:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   61: 
   62: all() ->
   63:     trace_sessions:all().
   64: 
   65: groups() ->
   66:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   67: 
   68: testcases() ->
   69:     [cpu_timestamp, receive_trace, link_receive_call_correlation,
   70:      self_send, timeout_trace,
   71:      send_trace, procs_trace, dist_procs_trace, suspend,
   72:      suspend_exit, suspender_exit,
   73:      suspend_system_limit, suspend_opts, suspend_waiting,
   74:      new_clear, existing_clear, tracer_die, set_on_spawn,
   75:      set_on_first_spawn, set_on_link, set_on_first_link,
   76:      system_monitor_args,
   77:      more_system_monitor_args, system_monitor_long_gc_1,
   78:      system_monitor_long_gc_2, system_monitor_large_heap_1,
   79:      system_monitor_long_schedule,
   80:      system_monitor_large_heap_2, system_monitor_long_message_queue,
   81:      system_monitor_long_message_queue_ignore,
   82:      bad_flag, trace_delivered,
   83:      trap_exit_self_receive, trace_info_badarg, erl_704,
   84:      ms_excessive_nesting].
   85: 
   86: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   87:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   88: 
   89: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   90:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   91: 
   92: 
   93: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   94:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   95: 
   96: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   97:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   98: 
   99: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config0) ->
  100:     Config1 = [{receiver,spawn(fun receiver/0)}|Config0],
  101:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config1).
  102: 
  103: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  104:     Receiver = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
  105:     unlink(Receiver),
  106:     exit(Receiver, die),
  107: 
  108:     (erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config)
  109:      andalso
  110:      trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config)).
  111: 
  112: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
  113:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
  114: 
  115: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
  116:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
  117: 
  118: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
  119:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
  120: 
  121: erlang_system_monitor() ->
  122:     trace_sessions:erlang_system_monitor().
  123: erlang_system_monitor(A) ->
  124:     trace_sessions:erlang_system_monitor(A).
  125: erlang_system_monitor(A,B) ->
  126:     trace_sessions:erlang_system_monitor(A,B).
  127: 
  128: %% No longer testing anything, just reporting whether cpu_timestamp
  129: %% is enabled or not.
  130: cpu_timestamp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     %% Test whether cpu_timestamp is implemented on this platform.
  132:     Works = try erlang_trace(all, true, [cpu_timestamp]) of
  133:                 _ ->
  134:                     erlang_trace(all, false, [cpu_timestamp]),
  135:                     true
  136:             catch
  137:                 error:badarg -> false
  138:             end,
  139:     {comment,case Works of
  140:                  false -> "cpu_timestamp is NOT implemented/does not work";
  141:                  true -> "cpu_timestamp works"
  142:              end}.
  143: 
  144: 
  145: %% Tests that trace(Pid, How, ['receive']) works.
  146: 
  147: receive_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     Receiver = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
  149: 
  150:     %% Trace the process; make sure that we receive the trace messages.
  151:     1 = erlang_trace(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  152:     Hello = {hello, world},
  153:     Receiver ! Hello,
  154:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace(),
  155:     Hello2 = {hello, again, world},
  156:     Receiver ! Hello2,
  157:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello2} = receive_first_trace(),
  158:     receive_nothing(),
  159: 
  160:     %% Test 'receive' with matchspec
  161:     F1 = fun ({Pat, IsMatching}) ->
  162: 		 set_trace_pattern('receive', Pat, []),
  163: 		 Receiver ! Hello,
  164: 		 case IsMatching of
  165: 		     true ->
  166: 			 {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace();
  167: 		     false ->
  168: 			 ok
  169: 		 end,
  170: 		 receive_nothing()
  171: 	 end,
  172:     From = self(),
  173:     Node = node(),
  174:     lists:foreach(F1, [{no, true},
  175: 		       {[{[Node, undefined,"Unexpected"],[],[]}], false},
  176: 		       {[{[Node, From,'_'],[],[]}], true},
  177: 		       {[{[Node, '$1','_'],[{'=/=','$1',From}],[]}], false},
  178: 		       {[{['$1', '_','_'],[{'=:=','$1',Node}],[]}], true},
  179: 		       {false, false},
  180: 		       {true, true}]),
  181: 
  182:     %% Remote messages
  183:     {ok, Peer, OtherNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
  184:     RemoteProc = spawn_link(OtherNode, ?MODULE, process, [self()]),
  185:     io:format("RemoteProc = ~p ~n", [RemoteProc]),
  186: 
  187:     RemoteProc ! {send_please, Receiver, Hello},
  188:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace(),
  189:     RemoteProc ! {send_please, Receiver, 99},
  190:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', 99} = receive_first_trace(),
  191: 
  192:     %% Remote with matchspec
  193:     F2 = fun (To, {Pat, IsMatching}) ->
  194: 		 set_trace_pattern('receive', Pat, []),
  195: 		 RemoteProc ! {send_please, To, Hello},
  196: 		 case IsMatching of
  197: 		     true ->
  198: 			 {trace, Receiver, 'receive', Hello} = receive_first_trace();
  199: 		     false ->
  200: 			 ok
  201: 		 end,
  202: 		 receive_nothing()
  203: 	 end,
  204:     F2(Receiver, {no, true}),
  205:     F2(Receiver, {[{[OtherNode, undefined,"Unexpected"],[],[]}], false}),
  206:     F2(Receiver, {[{[OtherNode, RemoteProc,'_'],[],[]},
  207: 		   {[OtherNode, undefined,'_'],[],[]}], true}),
  208:     F2(Receiver, {[{[OtherNode, '$1','_'],
  209: 		    [{'orelse',{'=:=','$1',undefined},{'=/=',{node,'$1'},{node}}}],
  210: 		    []}], true}),
  211:     F2(Receiver, {[{['$1', '_','_'], [{'=:=','$1',OtherNode}], []}], true}),
  212:     F2(Receiver, {false, false}),
  213:     F2(Receiver, {true, true}),
  214: 
  215:     %% Remote to named with matchspec
  216:     Name = trace_SUITE_receiver,
  217:     register(Name, Receiver),
  218:     NN = {Name, node()},
  219:     F2(NN, {no, true}),
  220:     F2(NN, {[{[OtherNode, undefined,"Unexpected"],[],[]}], false}),
  221:     F2(NN, {[{[OtherNode, RemoteProc,'_'],[],[]},
  222: 	     {[OtherNode, undefined,'_'],[],[]}], true}),
  223:     F2(NN, {[{[OtherNode, '$1','_'],
  224: 	      [{'orelse',{'=:=','$1',undefined},{'=/=',{node,'$1'},{node}}}],
  225: 	      []}], true}),
  226:     F2(NN, {[{['$1', '_','_'], [{'==','$1',OtherNode}], []}], true}),
  227:     F2(NN, {false, false}),
  228:     F2(NN, {true, true}),
  229: 
  230:     unlink(RemoteProc),
  231:     peer:stop(Peer),
  232: 
  233:     %% Timeout
  234:     Receiver ! {set_timeout, 10},
  235:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', {set_timeout, 10}} = receive_first_trace(),
  236:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', timeout} = receive_first_trace(),
  237:     erlang_trace_pattern('receive', [{[clock_service,undefined,timeout], [], []}], []),
  238:     Receiver ! {set_timeout, 7},
  239:     {trace, Receiver, 'receive', timeout} = receive_first_trace(),
  240:     erlang_trace_pattern('receive', true, []),
  241: 
  242:     %% Another process should not be able to trace Receiver.
  243:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  244:     Intruder = fun_spawn(fun() -> erlang_trace(Receiver, true, ['receive']) end),
  245:     {'EXIT', Intruder, {badarg, _}} = receive_first(),
  246: 
  247:     %% Untrace the process; we should not receive anything.
  248:     1 = erlang_trace(Receiver, false, ['receive']),
  249:     Receiver ! {hello, there},
  250:     Receiver ! any_garbage,
  251:     receive_nothing(),
  252: 
  253:     %% Verify restrictions in matchspec for 'receive'
  254:     F3 = fun (Pat) -> {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern('receive', Pat, [])) end,
  255:     WC = ['_','_','_'],
  256:     F3([{WC,[],[{message, {process_dump}}]}]),
  257:     F3([{WC,[{is_seq_trace}],[]}]),
  258:     F3([{WC,[],[{set_seq_token,label,4711}]}]),
  259:     F3([{WC,[],[{get_seq_token}]}]),
  260:     F3([{WC,[],[{enable_trace,call}]}]),
  261:     F3([{WC,[],[{enable_trace,self(),call}]}]),
  262:     F3([{WC,[],[{disable_trace,call}]}]),
  263:     F3([{WC,[],[{disable_trace,self(),call}]}]),
  264:     F3([{WC,[],[{trace,[call],[]}]}]),
  265:     F3([{WC,[],[{trace,self(),[],[call]}]}]),
  266:     F3([{WC,[],[{caller}]}]),
  267:     F3([{WC,[],[{silent,true}]}]),
  268: 
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: %% Tests that receive of a message always happens before a call with
  272: %% that message and that links/unlinks are ordered together with the
  273: %% 'receive'.
  274: link_receive_call_correlation() ->
  275:     [{timetrap, {minutes, 5}}].
  276: link_receive_call_correlation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  277:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun F() ->
  278:                                  receive
  279:                                      stop -> ok;
  280:                                      M -> receive_msg(M), F()
  281:                                  end
  282:                          end),
  283:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  284: 
  285:     %% Trace the process; make sure that we receive the trace messages.
  286:     1 = erlang_trace(Receiver, true, ['receive', procs, call, timestamp, scheduler_id]),
  287:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, receive_msg, '_'}, [], [local]),
  288: 
  289:     Num = 100,
  290: 
  291:     (fun F(0) -> [];
  292:          F(N) ->
  293:              if N rem 2 == 0 ->
  294:                      link(Receiver);
  295:                 true ->
  296:                      unlink(Receiver)
  297:              end,
  298:              [Receiver ! N | F(N-1)]
  299:      end)(Num),
  300: 
  301:     Receiver ! stop,
  302:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, Receiver),
  303:     receive {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} -> ok end,
  304:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Receiver),
  305:     receive {trace_delivered, _, Ref} -> ok end,
  306: 
  307:     Msgs = (fun F() -> receive M -> [M | F()] after 1 -> [] end end)(),
  308: 
  309:     case check_consistent(Receiver, Num, Num, Num, Msgs, false, undefined) of
  310:         ok ->
  311:             ok;
  312:         {error, Reason} ->
  313:             ct:log("~p", [Msgs]),
  314:             ct:fail({error, Reason})
  315:     end.
  316: 
  317: -define(schedid, , _).
  318: 
  319: check_consistent(_Pid, Recv, Call, _LU, [Msg | _], _Received, _LinkedN) when Recv > Call ->
  320:     {error, Msg};
  321: check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, [Msg | Msgs], false, undefined) ->
  322: 
  323:     case Msg of
  324:         {trace, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid} ->
  325:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  326:         {trace_ts, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid, _} ->
  327:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  328: 
  329:         {trace, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid} ->
  330:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  331:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid, _} ->
  332:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  333: 
  334:         {trace, Pid, _, _Self ?schedid} ->
  335:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  336:         {trace_ts, Pid, _, _Self ?schedid, _} ->
  337:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, false, undefined);
  338: 
  339:         Msg ->
  340:             {error, Msg}
  341:     end;
  342: check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, [Msg | Msgs], true, undefined) ->
  343: 
  344:     case Msg of
  345:         {trace, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid} ->
  346:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  347:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid, _} ->
  348:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, undefined);
  349: 
  350:         {trace, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid} ->
  351:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, Recv rem 2);
  352:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid, _} ->
  353:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, Recv rem 2);
  354: 
  355:         {trace, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid} ->
  356:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, (Recv+1) rem 2);
  357:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid, _} ->
  358:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, (Recv+1) rem 2);
  359: 
  360:         Msg ->
  361:             {error, Msg}
  362:     end;
  363: check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, [Msg | Msgs], true, LinkedN) ->
  364:     UnlinkedN = (LinkedN + 1) rem 2,
  365: 
  366:     case Msg of
  367:         {trace, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid} when Recv == LU ->
  368:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  369:         {trace_ts, Pid, 'receive', Recv ?schedid, _} when Recv == LU ->
  370:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv - 1, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  371: 
  372:         {trace, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid} ->
  373:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  374:         {trace_ts, Pid, call, {?MODULE, receive_msg, [Call]} ?schedid, _} ->
  375:             check_consistent(Pid,Recv, Call - 1, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  376: 
  377:         %% We check that for each receive we have gotten a
  378:         %% getting_linked or getting_unlinked message. Also
  379:         %% if we receive a getting_linked, then the next
  380:         %% message we expect to receive is an even number
  381:         %% and odd number for getting_unlinked.
  382:         {trace, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid}
  383:           when Recv rem 2 == LinkedN ->
  384:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  385:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_linked, _Self ?schedid, _}
  386:           when Recv rem 2 == LinkedN ->
  387:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  388: 
  389:         {trace, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid}
  390:           when Recv rem 2 == UnlinkedN ->
  391:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  392:         {trace_ts, Pid, getting_unlinked, _Self ?schedid, _}
  393:           when Recv rem 2 == UnlinkedN ->
  394:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU - 1, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  395: 
  396:         {trace,Pid,'receive',Ignore ?schedid}
  397:           when Ignore == stop; Ignore == timeout ->
  398:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  399:         {trace_ts,Pid,'receive',Ignore ?schedid,_}
  400:           when Ignore == stop; Ignore == timeout ->
  401:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  402: 
  403:         {trace, Pid, exit, normal ?schedid} ->
  404:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  405:         {trace_ts, Pid, exit, normal  ?schedid, _} ->
  406:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  407:         {'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
  408:             check_consistent(Pid, Recv, Call, LU, Msgs, true, LinkedN);
  409:         Msg ->
  410:             {error, Msg}
  411:     end;
  412: check_consistent(_, 0, 0, 1, [], true, _) ->
  413:     ok;
  414: check_consistent(_, Recv, Call, LU, [], _, _) ->
  415:     {error,{Recv, Call, LU}}.
  416: 
  417: receive_msg(M) ->
  418:     M.
  419: 
  420: %% Test that traces are generated for messages sent
  421: %% and received to/from self().
  422: self_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  423:     Fun =
  424:     fun(Self, Parent) -> receive
  425:                              go_ahead ->
  426:                                  self() ! from_myself,
  427:                                  Self(Self, Parent);
  428:                              from_myself ->
  429:                                  Parent ! done
  430:                          end
  431:     end,
  432:     Self = self(),
  433:     SelfSender = fun_spawn(Fun, [Fun, Self]),
  434:     erlang_trace(SelfSender, true, ['receive', 'send']),
  435:     SelfSender ! go_ahead,
  436:     receive {trace, SelfSender, 'receive', go_ahead} -> ok end,
  437:     receive {trace, SelfSender, 'receive', from_myself} -> ok end,
  438:     receive
  439:         {trace,SelfSender,send,from_myself,SelfSender} -> ok
  440:     end,
  441:     receive {trace,SelfSender,send,done,Self} -> ok end,
  442:     receive done -> ok end,
  443:     ok.
  444: 
  445: %% Test that we can receive timeout traces.
  446: timeout_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  447:     Process = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  448:     1 = erlang_trace(Process, true, ['receive']),
  449:     Process ! timeout_please,
  450:     {trace, Process, 'receive', timeout_please} = receive_first_trace(),
  451:     {trace, Process, 'receive', timeout} = receive_first_trace(),
  452:     receive_nothing(),
  453:     ok.
  454: 
  455: %% Tests that trace(Pid, How, [send]) works.
  456: 
  457: send_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  458:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  459:     Sender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  460:     Receiver = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
  461: 
  462:     %% Check that a message sent to another process is traced.
  463:     1 = erlang_trace(Sender, true, [send]),
  464:     F1 = fun (Pat) ->
  465: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  466: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  467: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, Receiver} = receive_first_trace(),
  468: 		 receive_nothing()
  469: 	 end,
  470:     lists:foreach(F1, [no,
  471: 		       [{[Receiver,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  472: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  473: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  474: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  475: 		       true]),
  476: 
  477:     %% Test {message, Msg}
  478:     F1m = fun ({Pat, Msg}) ->
  479: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  480: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  481: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, Receiver, Msg} = receive_first_trace(),
  482: 		 receive_nothing()
  483: 	 end,
  484:     lists:foreach(F1m, [{[{['_','_'],[],[{message, 4711}]}], 4711},
  485: 			{[{['_','_'],[],[{message, "4711"}]}], "4711"}
  486: 		       ]),
  487: 
  488:     %% Test {message, {process_dump}}
  489:     set_trace_pattern(send, [{['_','_'],[],[{message, {process_dump}}]}], []),
  490:     Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  491:     {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, Receiver, ProcDump} = receive_first_trace(),
  492:     true = is_binary(ProcDump),
  493:     receive_nothing(),
  494: 
  495:     %% Same test with false match spec
  496:     F2 = fun (Pat) ->
  497: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  498: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  499: 		 receive_nothing()
  500: 	 end,
  501:     lists:foreach(F2, [[{[Sender,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  502: 		       [{[Receiver,nomatch],[],[]}],
  503: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  504: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  505: 		       false,
  506: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{message,false}]}],
  507: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{silent,true}]}]]),
  508:     erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, []),
  509:     erlang_trace(Sender, false, [silent]),
  510: 
  511:     %% Check that a message sent to another registered process is traced.
  512:     register(?MODULE,Receiver),
  513:     F3 = fun (Pat) ->
  514: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  515: 		 Sender ! {send_please, ?MODULE, to_receiver},
  516: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_receiver, ?MODULE} = receive_first_trace(),
  517: 		 receive_nothing()
  518: 	 end,
  519:     lists:foreach(F3, [no,
  520: 		       [{[?MODULE,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  521: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  522: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  523: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_atom,'$1'}],[]}],
  524: 		       true]),
  525:     %% Again with false match spec
  526:     F4 = fun (Pat) ->
  527: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  528: 		 Sender ! {send_please, ?MODULE, to_receiver},
  529: 		 receive_nothing()
  530: 	 end,
  531:     lists:foreach(F4, [[{[nomatch,to_receiver],[],[]}],
  532: 		       [{[?MODULE,nomatch],[],[]}],
  533: 		       [{['$1','_'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  534: 		       [{['_','$1'],[{is_pid,'$1'}],[]}],
  535: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{message,false}]}],
  536: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[{silent,true}]}]
  537: 		      ]),
  538:     unregister(?MODULE),
  539:     erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, []),
  540:     erlang_trace(Sender, false, [silent]),
  541: 
  542:     %% Check that a message sent to this process is traced.
  543:     F5 = fun (Pat) ->
  544: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  545: 		 Sender ! {send_please, self(), to_myself},
  546: 		 receive to_myself -> ok end,
  547: 		 Self = self(),
  548: 		 {trace, Sender, send, to_myself, Self} = receive_first_trace(),
  549: 		 receive_nothing()
  550: 	 end,
  551:     lists:foreach(F5, [no,
  552: 		       [{[self(),to_myself],[],[]}],
  553: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  554: 		       true]),
  555: 
  556:     %% Check that a message sent to dead process is traced.
  557:     {Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> ok end),
  558:     receive {'DOWN',Ref,_,_,_} -> ok end,
  559:     F6 = fun (Pat) ->
  560: 		 set_trace_pattern(send, Pat, []),
  561: 		 Sender ! {send_please, Pid, to_dead},
  562: 		 {trace, Sender, send_to_non_existing_process, to_dead, Pid} = receive_first_trace(),
  563: 		 receive_nothing()
  564: 	 end,
  565:     lists:foreach(F6, [no,
  566: 		       [{[Pid,to_dead],[],[]}],
  567: 		       [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  568: 		       true]),
  569: 
  570:     %% Check that a message sent to unknown registrated process is traced.
  571:     BadargSender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  572:     1 = erlang_trace(BadargSender, true, [send]),
  573:     unlink(BadargSender),
  574:     BadargSender ! {send_please, not_registered, to_unknown},
  575:     {trace, BadargSender, send, to_unknown, not_registered} = receive_first_trace(),
  576:     receive_nothing(),
  577: 
  578:     %% Another process should not be able to trace Sender.
  579:     Intruder = fun_spawn(fun() -> erlang_trace(Sender, true, [send]) end),
  580:     {'EXIT', Intruder, {badarg, _}} = receive_first(),
  581: 
  582:     %% Untrace the sender process and make sure that we receive no more
  583:     %% trace messages.
  584:     1 = erlang_trace(Sender, false, [send]),
  585:     Sender ! {send_please, Receiver, to_receiver},
  586:     Sender ! {send_please, self(), to_myself_again},
  587:     receive to_myself_again -> ok end,
  588:     receive_nothing(),
  589:     
  590:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [global])),
  591:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [local])),
  592:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [meta])),
  593:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [{meta,self()}])),
  594:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [call_count])),
  595:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, true, [call_time])),
  596:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, restart, [])),
  597:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, pause, [])),
  598:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_trace_pattern(send, [{['_','_'],[],[{caller}]}], [])),
  599: 
  600:     %% Done.
  601:     ok.
  602: 
  603: set_trace_pattern(_, no, _) -> 0;
  604: set_trace_pattern(MFA, Pat, Flg) ->
  605:     R = erlang_trace_pattern(MFA, Pat, Flg),
  606:     {match_spec, Pat} = erlang_trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  607:     R.
  608: 
  609: %% Test trace(Pid, How, [procs]).
  610: procs_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  611:     Name = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_procs_trace"),
  612:     Self = self(),
  613:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  614:     %%
  615:     Proc1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  616:     io:format("Proc1 = ~p ~n", [Proc1]),
  617:     Proc2 = spawn(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  618:     io:format("Proc2 = ~p ~n", [Proc2]),
  619:     %%
  620:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc1, true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  621:     MFA = {?MODULE, process, [Self]},
  622:     %%
  623:     %% spawn, link
  624:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, MFA},
  625:     Proc3 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P3} -> P3 end,
  626:     receive {trace, Proc3, spawned, Proc1, MFA} -> ok end,
  627:     receive {trace, Proc3, getting_linked, Proc1} -> ok end,
  628:     {trace, Proc1, spawn, Proc3, MFA} = receive_first_trace(),
  629:     io:format("Proc3 = ~p ~n", [Proc3]),
  630:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  631:     receive_nothing(),
  632:     %%
  633:     %% getting_unlinked by exit()
  634:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, true},
  635:     Reason3 = make_ref(),
  636:     Proc1 ! {send_please, Proc3, {exit_please, Reason3}},
  637:     receive {Proc1, {'EXIT', Proc3, Reason3}} -> ok end,
  638:     receive {trace, Proc3, exit, Reason3} -> ok end,
  639:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  640:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, false},
  641:     receive_nothing(),
  642:     %%
  643:     %% link
  644:     Proc1 ! {link_please, Proc2},
  645:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  646:     receive_nothing(),
  647:     %%
  648:     %% unlink
  649:     Proc1 ! {unlink_please, Proc2},
  650:     {trace, Proc1, unlink, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  651:     receive_nothing(),
  652:     %%
  653:     %% getting_linked
  654:     Proc2 ! {link_please, Proc1},
  655:     {trace, Proc1, getting_linked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  656:     receive_nothing(),
  657:     %%
  658:     %% getting_unlinked
  659:     Proc2 ! {unlink_please, Proc1},
  660:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  661:     receive_nothing(),
  662:     %%
  663:     %% register
  664:     true = register(Name, Proc1),
  665:     {trace, Proc1, register, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  666:     receive_nothing(),
  667:     %%
  668:     %% unregister
  669:     true = unregister(Name),
  670:     {trace, Proc1, unregister, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  671:     receive_nothing(),
  672:     %%
  673:     %% exit (with registered name, due to link)
  674:     Reason4 = make_ref(),
  675:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, MFA},
  676:     Proc4 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P4} -> P4 end,
  677:     {trace, Proc1, spawn, Proc4, MFA} = receive_first_trace(),
  678:     io:format("Proc4 = ~p ~n", [Proc4]),
  679:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc4} = receive_first_trace(),
  680:     Proc1 ! {register_please, Name, Proc1},
  681:     {trace, Proc1, register, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  682:     Proc4 ! {exit_please, Reason4},
  683:     receive {'EXIT', Proc1, Reason4} -> ok end,
  684:     {trace, Proc1, exit, Reason4} = receive_first_trace(),
  685:     {trace, Proc1, unregister, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  686:     receive_nothing(),
  687:     %%
  688:     %% exit (not linked to tracing process)
  689:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc2, true, [procs]),
  690:     Reason2 = make_ref(),
  691:     Proc2 ! {exit_please, Reason2},
  692:     {trace, Proc2, exit, Reason2} = receive_first_trace(),
  693:     receive_nothing(),
  694:     ok.
  695: 
  696: 
  697: dist_procs_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  698:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  699:     {ok, Peer, OtherNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
  700:     Self = self(),
  701:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  702:     %%
  703:     Proc1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  704:     io:format("Proc1 = ~p ~n", [Proc1]),
  705:     Proc2 = spawn(OtherNode, ?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  706:     io:format("Proc2 = ~p ~n", [Proc2]),
  707:     %%
  708:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc1, true, [procs]),
  709:     MFA = {?MODULE, process, [Self]},
  710:     %%
  711:     %% getting_unlinked by exit()
  712:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, OtherNode, MFA},
  713:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, true},
  714:     Proc3 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P3} -> P3 end,
  715:     io:format("Proc3 = ~p ~n", [Proc3]),
  716:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  717:     Reason3 = make_ref(),
  718:     Proc1 ! {send_please, Proc3, {exit_please, Reason3}},
  719:     receive {Proc1, {'EXIT', Proc3, Reason3}} -> ok end,
  720:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc3} = receive_first_trace(),
  721:     Proc1 ! {trap_exit_please, false},
  722:     receive_nothing(),
  723:     %%
  724:     %% link
  725:     Proc1 ! {link_please, Proc2},
  726:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  727:     receive_nothing(),
  728:     %%
  729:     %% unlink
  730:     Proc1 ! {unlink_please, Proc2},
  731:     {trace, Proc1, unlink, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  732:     receive_nothing(),
  733:     %%
  734:     %% getting_linked
  735:     Proc2 ! {link_please, Proc1},
  736:     {trace, Proc1, getting_linked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  737:     receive_nothing(),
  738:     %%
  739:     %% getting_unlinked
  740:     Proc2 ! {unlink_please, Proc1},
  741:     {trace, Proc1, getting_unlinked, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  742:     receive_nothing(),
  743: 
  744:     %%
  745:     %% exit (with registered name, due to link)
  746:     Name = list_to_atom(hd(string:lexemes(atom_to_list(OtherNode), "@"))),
  747:     Reason2 = make_ref(),
  748:     Proc1 ! {link_please, Proc2},
  749:     {trace, Proc1, link, Proc2} = receive_first_trace(),
  750:     Proc1 ! {register_please, Name, Proc1},
  751:     {trace, Proc1, register, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  752:     Proc2 ! {exit_please, Reason2},
  753:     receive {'EXIT', Proc1, Reason2} -> ok end,
  754:     {trace, Proc1, exit, Reason2} = receive_first_trace(),
  755:     {trace, Proc1, unregister, Name} = receive_first_trace(),
  756:     receive_nothing(),
  757:     %%
  758:     %% Done.
  759:     peer:stop(Peer).
  760: 
  761: %% Test trace(new, How, [procs]).
  762: procs_new_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  763:     Self = self(),
  764:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  765:     %%
  766:     Proc1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, process, [Self]),
  767:     io:format("Proc1 = ~p ~n", [Proc1]),
  768:     %%
  769:     0 = erlang_trace(new, true, [procs]),
  770: 
  771:     MFA = {?MODULE, process, [Self]},
  772:     %%
  773:     %% spawn, link
  774:     Proc1 ! {spawn_link_please, Self, MFA},
  775:     Proc3 = receive {spawned, Proc1, P3} -> P3 end,
  776:     receive {trace, Proc3, spawned, Proc1, MFA} -> ok end,
  777:     receive {trace, Proc3, getting_linked, Proc1} -> ok end,
  778:     io:format("Proc3 = ~p ~n", [Proc3]),
  779:     receive_nothing(),
  780:     %%
  781:     %%
  782:     %% exit (not linked to tracing process)
  783:     Reason1 = make_ref(),
  784:     Proc1 ! {exit_please, Reason1},
  785:     receive {'EXIT', Proc1, Reason1} -> ok end,
  786:     {trace, Proc3, exit, Reason1} = receive_first_trace(),
  787:     receive_nothing(),
  788:     ok.
  789: 
  790: 
  791: 
  792: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_spawn]).
  793: 
  794: set_on_spawn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  795:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  796: 
  797:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_spawn flag.
  798:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  799:     Father_SOS = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  800:     1 = erlang_trace(Father_SOS, true, [send, set_on_spawn]),
  801:     true = is_send_traced(Father_SOS, Listener, sos_father),
  802: 
  803:     %% Have the process spawn of two children and test that they
  804:     %% are traced.
  805:     [Child1, Child2] = spawn_children(Father_SOS, 2),
  806:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  807:     true = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  808: 
  809:     %% Second generation.
  810:     [Child11, Child12] = spawn_children(Child1, 2),
  811:     true = is_send_traced(Child11, Listener, child11),
  812:     true = is_send_traced(Child12, Listener, child12),
  813:     ok.
  814: 
  815: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_first_spawn]).
  816: 
  817: set_on_first_spawn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  818:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  819:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  820: 
  821:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_first_spawn flag.
  822:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  823:     Parent = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  824:     1 = erlang_trace(Parent, true, [send, set_on_first_spawn]),
  825:     is_send_traced(Parent, Listener, sos_father),
  826: 
  827:     %% Have the process spawn off three children and test that the
  828:     %% first is traced.
  829:     [Child1, Child2, Child3] = spawn_children(Parent, 3),
  830:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  831:     false = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  832:     false = is_send_traced(Child3, Listener, child3),
  833:     receive_nothing(),
  834:     ok.
  835: 
  836: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_link]).
  837: 
  838: set_on_link(_Config) ->
  839:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  840: 
  841:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_link flag.
  842:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  843:     Father_SOL = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  844:     1 = erlang_trace(Father_SOL, true, [send, set_on_link]),
  845:     true = is_send_traced(Father_SOL, Listener, sol_father),
  846: 
  847:     %% Have the process spawn of two children and test that they
  848:     %% are traced.
  849:     [Child1, Child2] = spawn_children(Father_SOL, 2),
  850:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  851:     true = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  852: 
  853:     %% Second generation.
  854:     [Child11, Child12] = spawn_children(Child1, 2),
  855:     true = is_send_traced(Child11, Listener, child11),
  856:     true = is_send_traced(Child12, Listener, child12),
  857:     ok.
  858: 
  859: %% Tests trace(Pid, How, [set_on_first_spawn]).
  860: 
  861: set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  862:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  863:     Listener = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  864: 
  865:     %% Create and trace a process with the set_on_first_spawn flag.
  866:     %% Make sure it is traced.
  867:     Parent = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
  868:     1 = erlang_trace(Parent, true, [send, set_on_first_link]),
  869:     is_send_traced(Parent, Listener, sol_father),
  870: 
  871:     %% Have the process spawn off three children and test that the
  872:     %% first is traced.
  873:     [Child1, Child2, Child3] = spawn_children(Parent, 3),
  874:     true = is_send_traced(Child1, Listener, child1),
  875:     false = is_send_traced(Child2, Listener, child2),
  876:     false = is_send_traced(Child3, Listener, child3),
  877:     receive_nothing(),
  878:     ok.
  879: 
  880: 
  881: 
  882: %% Tests arguments to erlang:system_monitor/0,1,2
  883: system_monitor_args(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  884:     Self = self(),
  885:     %%
  886:     OldMonitor = erlang_system_monitor(undefined),
  887:     undefined = erlang_system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,0}]),
  888:     MinT = case erlang_system_monitor() of
  889:                {Self,[{long_gc,T}]} when is_integer(T), T > 0 -> T;
  890:                Other1 -> test_server:fault(Other1)
  891:            end,
  892:     {Self,[{long_gc,MinT}]} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  893:     {Self,[{long_gc,MinT}]} = 
  894:     erlang_system_monitor({Self,[{large_heap,0}]}),
  895:     MinN = case erlang_system_monitor() of
  896:                {Self,[{large_heap,N}]} when is_integer(N), N > 0 -> N;
  897:                Other2 -> test_server:fault(Other2)
  898:            end,
  899:     {Self,[{large_heap,MinN}]} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  900:     {Self,[{large_heap,MinN}]} = 
  901:         erlang_system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {100,101}}]),
  902:     {Self,[{long_message_queue,{100,101}}]} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  903:     {Self,[{long_message_queue,{100,101}}]} =
  904:         erlang_system_monitor(Self, [busy_port]),
  905:     {Self,[busy_port]} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  906:     {Self,[busy_port]} = 
  907:     erlang_system_monitor({Self,[busy_dist_port]}),
  908:     {Self,[busy_dist_port]} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  909:     All = lists:sort([busy_port,busy_dist_port,
  910:                       {long_gc,1},{large_heap,65535},{long_message_queue,{99,100}}]),
  911:     {Self,[busy_dist_port]} = erlang_system_monitor(Self, All),
  912:     {Self,A1} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  913:     All = lists:sort(A1),
  914:     {Self,A1} = erlang_system_monitor(Self, []),
  915:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> receive {Self,die} -> exit(die) end end),
  916:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
  917:     undefined = erlang_system_monitor(Pid, All),
  918:     {Pid,A2} = erlang_system_monitor(),
  919:     All = lists:sort(A2),
  920:     Pid ! {Self,die},
  921:     receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok end,
  922:     undefined = erlang_system_monitor(OldMonitor),
  923:     erlang:yield(),
  924:     OldMonitor = erlang_system_monitor(),
  925:     %%
  926:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_system_monitor(atom)),
  927:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_system_monitor({})),
  928:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_system_monitor({1})),
  929:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang_system_monitor({1,2,3})),
  930:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  931:     (catch erlang_system_monitor({Self,atom})),
  932:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  933:     (catch erlang_system_monitor(atom, atom)),
  934:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  935:     (catch erlang_system_monitor({Self,[busy_port|busy_dist_port]})),
  936:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  937:     (catch erlang_system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,-1}])),
  938:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  939:     (catch erlang_system_monitor({Self,[{long_gc,atom}]})),
  940:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  941:     (catch erlang_system_monitor(Self,[{large_heap,-1}])),
  942:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  943:     (catch erlang_system_monitor({Self,[{large_heap,atom}]})),
  944:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  945:         (catch erlang_system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {100,100}}])),
  946:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  947:         (catch erlang_system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {-1,1}}])),
  948:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  949:         (catch erlang_system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {0,-1}}])),
  950:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = 
  951:         (catch erlang_system_monitor(Self,[{long_message_queue, {-1,0}}])),
  952:     ok.
  953: 
  954: 
  955: %% Tests arguments to erlang:system_monitor/0,1,2
  956: more_system_monitor_args(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  957:     try_l(64000),
  958:     try_l(16#7ffffff),
  959:     try_l(16#3fffffff),
  960:     try_l(16#7fffffff),
  961:     try_l(16#ffffffff),
  962:     ok.
  963: 
  964: try_l(Val) ->
  965:     Self = self(),
  966:     Arbitrary1 = 77777,
  967:     Arbitrary2 = 88888,
  968: 
  969:     erlang_system_monitor(undefined),
  970: 
  971:     undefined = erlang_system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,Val},{large_heap,Arbitrary1}]),
  972: 
  973:     {Self,Comb0} = erlang_system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,Arbitrary2},{large_heap,Val}]),
  974:     [{large_heap,Arbitrary1},{long_gc,Val}] = lists:sort(Comb0),
  975: 
  976:     {Self,Comb1} = erlang_system_monitor(undefined),
  977:     [{large_heap,Val},{long_gc,Arbitrary2}] = lists:sort(Comb1).
  978: 
  979: monitor_sys(Parent) ->
  980:     receive 
  981:         {monitor,Pid,long_schedule,Data} when is_pid(Pid) -> 
  982:             io:format("Long schedule of ~w: ~w~n",[Pid,Data]),
  983:             Parent ! {Pid,Data},
  984:             monitor_sys(Parent);
  985:         {monitor,Port,long_schedule,Data} when is_port(Port) -> 
  986:             {name,Name} = erlang:port_info(Port,name),
  987:             io:format("Long schedule of ~w (~p): ~w~n",[Port,Name,Data]),
  988:             Parent ! {Port,Data},
  989:             monitor_sys(Parent);
  990:         Other ->
  991:             erlang:display(Other)
  992:     end.
  993: 
  994: start_monitor() ->
  995:     Parent = self(),
  996:     Mpid = spawn_link(fun() -> monitor_sys(Parent) end),
  997:     erlang_system_monitor(Mpid,[{long_schedule,100}]),
  998:     erlang:yield(), % Need to be rescheduled for the trace to take
  999:     ok.
 1000: 
 1001: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{long_schedule,Time}])
 1002: system_monitor_long_schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1003:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1004:     case erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,"trace_SUITE"), []) of
 1005:         ok -> ok;
 1006:         {error, {reload,_}} -> ok
 1007:     end,
 1008:     erl_ddll:start(),
 1009:     case (catch load_driver(Path, slow_drv)) of
 1010:         ok ->
 1011:             do_system_monitor_long_schedule();
 1012:         _Error ->
 1013:             {skip, "Unable to load slow_drv (windows or no usleep()?)"}
 1014:     end.
 1015: 
 1016: slow_nif() ->
 1017:     erlang:nif_error("NIF not loaded").
 1018: 
 1019: do_system_monitor_long_schedule() ->
 1020:     start_monitor(),
 1021: 
 1022:     slow_nif(),
 1023:     Self = self(),
 1024:     receive
 1025:         {Self,L} when is_list(L) ->
 1026:             ok
 1027:     after 1000 ->
 1028:             ct:fail(no_trace_of_pid)
 1029:     end,
 1030: 
 1031:     Port = open_port({spawn_driver,slow_drv}, []),
 1032:     "ok" = erlang:port_control(Port,1,[]),
 1033:     receive
 1034:         {Port,LL} when is_list(LL) ->
 1035:             ok
 1036:     after 1000 ->
 1037:             ct:fail(no_trace_of_port)
 1038:     end,
 1039:     port_close(Port),
 1040:     erlang_system_monitor(undefined),
 1041:     ok.
 1042: 
 1043: 
 1044: -define(LONG_GC_SLEEP, 670).
 1045: 
 1046: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{long_gc,Time}])
 1047: system_monitor_long_gc_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1048:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 1049:     try 
 1050:         case erts_debug:get_internal_state(force_heap_frags) of
 1051:             true ->
 1052:                 {skip,"emulator with FORCE_HEAP_FRAGS defined"};
 1053:             false ->
 1054:                 %% Add ?LONG_GC_SLEEP ms to all gc
 1055:                 erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep,
 1056:                                               ?LONG_GC_SLEEP),
 1057:                 LoadFun = fun () -> 
 1058:                                   garbage_collect(),
 1059:                                   self() 
 1060:                           end,
 1061:                 long_gc(LoadFun, false)
 1062:         end
 1063:     after
 1064:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep, 0),
 1065:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false)	
 1066:     end.
 1067: 
 1068: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{long_gc,Time}])
 1069: system_monitor_long_gc_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1070:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 1071:     try
 1072:         case erts_debug:get_internal_state(force_heap_frags) of
 1073:             true ->
 1074:                 {skip,"emulator with FORCE_HEAP_FRAGS defined"};
 1075:             false ->
 1076:                 %% Add ?LONG_GC_SLEEP ms to all gc
 1077:                 erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep,
 1078:                                               ?LONG_GC_SLEEP),
 1079:                 Parent = self(),
 1080:                 LoadFun =
 1081:                 fun () ->
 1082:                         Ref = make_ref(),
 1083:                         Pid = 
 1084:                         spawn_link(
 1085:                           fun () ->
 1086:                                   garbage_collect(),
 1087:                                   Parent ! {Ref, self()}
 1088:                           end),
 1089:                         receive {Ref, Pid} -> Pid end
 1090:                 end,
 1091:                 long_gc(LoadFun, true),
 1092:                 long_gc(LoadFun, true),
 1093:                 long_gc(LoadFun, true)
 1094:         end
 1095:     after
 1096:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(test_long_gc_sleep, 0),
 1097:         erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false)
 1098:     end.
 1099: 
 1100: long_gc(LoadFun, ExpectMonMsg) ->
 1101:     Self = self(),
 1102:     Time = 1,
 1103:     OldMonitor = erlang_system_monitor(Self, [{long_gc,Time}]),
 1104:     Pid = LoadFun(),
 1105:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
 1106:     receive {trace_delivered, Pid, Ref} -> ok end,
 1107:     {Self,[{long_gc,Time}]} = erlang_system_monitor(OldMonitor),
 1108:     case {long_gc_check(Pid, Time, undefined), ExpectMonMsg} of
 1109:         {ok, true} when Pid =/= Self ->
 1110:             ok;
 1111:         {ok, false} ->
 1112:             ct:fail(unexpected_system_monitor_message_received);
 1113:         {undefined, false} ->
 1114:             ok;
 1115:         {undefined, true} ->
 1116:             ct:fail(no_system_monitor_message_received)
 1117:     end.
 1118: 
 1119: long_gc_check(Pid, Time, Result) ->
 1120:     receive
 1121:         {monitor,Pid,long_gc,L} = Monitor ->
 1122:             case lists:foldl(
 1123:                    fun (_, error) ->
 1124:                            error;
 1125:                        ({timeout,T}, N) when is_integer(T),
 1126:                                              Time =< T, T =< 10*?LONG_GC_SLEEP ->
 1127:                            %% OTP-7622. The time T must be within reasonable limits
 1128:                            %% for the test to pass.
 1129:                            N-1;
 1130:                        ({heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1131:                            N-1;
 1132:                        ({old_heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1133:                            N-1;
 1134:                        ({stack_size,_}, N) ->
 1135:                            N-1;
 1136:                        ({mbuf_size,_}, N) ->
 1137:                            N-1;
 1138:                        ({heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1139:                            N-1;
 1140:                        ({old_heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1141:                            N-1;
 1142:                        (_, _) ->
 1143:                            error
 1144:                    end, 7, L) of
 1145:                 0 ->
 1146:                     long_gc_check(Pid, Time, ok);
 1147:                 error ->
 1148:                     {error,Monitor}
 1149:             end;
 1150:         {monitor,_,long_gc,_} ->
 1151:             long_gc_check(Pid, Time, Result);
 1152:         Other ->
 1153:             {error,Other}
 1154:     after 0 ->
 1155:               Result
 1156:     end.
 1157: 
 1158: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{large_heap,Size}])
 1159: system_monitor_large_heap_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1160:     LoadFun =
 1161:     fun (Size) -> 
 1162:             List = seq(1,2*Size),
 1163:             garbage_collect(),
 1164:             true = lists:prefix([1], List),
 1165:             self() 
 1166:     end,
 1167:     large_heap(LoadFun, false).
 1168: 
 1169: %% Tests erlang:system_monitor(Pid, [{large_heap,Size}])
 1170: system_monitor_large_heap_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1171:     Parent = self(),
 1172:     LoadFun =
 1173:     fun (Size) ->
 1174:             Ref = make_ref(),
 1175:             Pid = 
 1176:             spawn_opt(fun () ->
 1177:                               garbage_collect(),
 1178:                               Parent ! {Ref, self()}
 1179:                       end,
 1180:                       [link, {min_heap_size, 2*Size}]),
 1181:             receive {Ref, Pid} -> Pid end
 1182:     end,
 1183:     large_heap(LoadFun, true).
 1184: 
 1185: large_heap(LoadFun, ExpectMonMsg) ->
 1186:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
 1187:     %%
 1188:     Size = 65535,
 1189:     Self = self(),
 1190:     NewMonitor = {Self,[{large_heap,Size}]},
 1191:     OldMonitor = erlang_system_monitor(NewMonitor),
 1192:     Pid = LoadFun(Size),
 1193:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
 1194:     receive {trace_delivered, Pid, Ref} -> ok end,
 1195:     {Self,[{large_heap,Size}]} = erlang_system_monitor(OldMonitor),
 1196:     case {large_heap_check(Pid, Size, undefined), ExpectMonMsg} of
 1197:         {ok, true} when Pid =/= Self ->
 1198:             ok;
 1199:         {ok, false} ->
 1200:             ct:fail(unexpected_system_monitor_message_received);
 1201:         {undefined, false} ->
 1202:             ok;
 1203:         {undefined, true} ->
 1204:             ct:fail(no_system_monitor_message_received)
 1205:     end,
 1206:     ok.
 1207: 
 1208: large_heap_check(Pid, Size, Result) ->
 1209:     receive
 1210:         {monitor,Pid,large_heap,L} = Monitor ->
 1211:             case lists:foldl(
 1212:                    fun (_, error) ->
 1213:                            error;
 1214:                        ({heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1215:                            N-1;
 1216:                        ({old_heap_size,_}, N) ->
 1217:                            N-1;
 1218:                        ({stack_size,_}, N) ->
 1219:                            N-1;
 1220:                        ({mbuf_size,_}, N) ->
 1221:                            N-1;
 1222:                        ({heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1223:                            N-1;
 1224:                        ({old_heap_block_size,_}, N) ->
 1225:                            N-1;
 1226:                        (_, _) ->
 1227:                            error
 1228:                    end, 6, L) of
 1229:                 0 ->
 1230:                     large_heap_check(Pid, Size, ok);
 1231:                 error ->
 1232:                     {error,Monitor}
 1233:             end;
 1234:         {monitor,_,large_heap,_} ->
 1235:             large_heap_check(Pid, Size, Result);
 1236:         Other ->
 1237:             {error,Other}
 1238:     after 0 ->
 1239:               Result
 1240:     end.
 1241: 
 1242: 
 1243: system_monitor_long_message_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1244:     Self = self(),
 1245:     SMonPrxy = spawn_link(fun () -> smon_lmq_proxy(Self) end),
 1246:     erlang_system_monitor(SMonPrxy,[{long_message_queue, {50,100}}]),
 1247:     erlang:yield(),
 1248:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 1249:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,true} -> ok
 1250:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_on_message)
 1251:     end,
 1252: 
 1253:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 10)),
 1254:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,_} = Msg0 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg0})
 1255:     after 1000 -> ok
 1256:     end,
 1257: 
 1258:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1259:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,_} = Msg1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg1})
 1260:     after 1000 -> ok
 1261:     end,
 1262: 
 1263:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1264:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,_} = Msg2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg2})
 1265:     after 1000 -> ok
 1266:     end,
 1267: 
 1268:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 60)),
 1269:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,false} -> ok
 1270:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_off_message)
 1271:     end,
 1272: 
 1273:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> self() ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 1274:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,true} -> ok
 1275:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_on_message)
 1276:     end,
 1277: 
 1278:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 1279:     receive {monitor,Self,long_message_queue,false} -> ok
 1280:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_off_message)
 1281:     end,
 1282: 
 1283:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> receive hello -> ok end end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1284:     {message_queue_len, 0} = process_info(self(), message_queue_len),
 1285: 
 1286:     unlink(SMonPrxy),
 1287:     exit(SMonPrxy, kill),
 1288:     false = is_process_alive(SMonPrxy),
 1289: 
 1290:     erlang_system_monitor(undefined),
 1291:     ok.
 1292: 
 1293: smon_lmq_proxy(To) ->
 1294:     receive Msg -> To ! Msg end,
 1295:     smon_lmq_proxy(To).
 1296: 
 1297: system_monitor_long_message_queue_ignore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1298:     %%
 1299:     %% Ensure that messages are delivered and monitored even if a
 1300:     %% process ignores the message queue while continuesly executing.
 1301:     %%
 1302:     erlang_system_monitor(self(),[{long_message_queue, {50,100}}]),
 1303:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun ignore_messages_working/0, [{priority,low}, link]),
 1304:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> Pid ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1305:     receive {monitor,Pid,long_message_queue,_} = Msg0 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg0})
 1306:     after 1000 -> ok
 1307:     end,
 1308: 
 1309:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> Pid ! hello end, lists:seq(1, 50)),
 1310:     receive {monitor,Pid,long_message_queue,true} -> ok
 1311:     after 5000 -> ct:fail(missing_on_message)
 1312:     end,
 1313: 
 1314:     unlink(Pid),
 1315:     exit(Pid, kill),
 1316:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 1317: 
 1318:     erlang_system_monitor(undefined),
 1319: 
 1320:     ok.
 1321: 
 1322: ignore_messages_working() ->
 1323:     _ = id(lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 1324:     ignore_messages_working().
 1325: 
 1326: id(X) ->
 1327:     X.
 1328: 
 1329: seq(N, M) ->
 1330:     seq(N, M, []).
 1331: 
 1332: seq(M, M, R) ->
 1333:     lists:reverse(R);
 1334: seq(N, M, R) ->
 1335:     seq(N+1, M, [N|R]).
 1336: 
 1337: 
 1338: is_send_traced(Pid, Listener, Msg) ->
 1339:     Pid ! {send_please, Listener, Msg},
 1340:     receive
 1341:         Any ->
 1342:             {trace, Pid, send, Msg, Listener} = Any,
 1343:             true
 1344:     after 1000 ->
 1345:               false
 1346:     end.
 1347: 
 1348: %% This procedure assumes that the Parent process is send traced.
 1349: 
 1350: spawn_children(Parent, Number) ->
 1351:     spawn_children(Parent, Number, []).
 1352: 
 1353: spawn_children(_Parent, 0, Result) ->
 1354:     lists:reverse(Result);
 1355: spawn_children(Parent, Number, Result) ->
 1356:     Self = self(),
 1357:     Parent ! {spawn_please, Self, fun process/0},
 1358:     Child = 
 1359:     receive
 1360:         {trace, Parent, send, {spawned, Pid}, Self} -> Pid
 1361:     end,
 1362:     receive
 1363:         {spawned, Child} ->
 1364:             spawn_children(Parent, Number-1, [Child|Result])
 1365:     end.
 1366: 
 1367: %% Test erlang:suspend/1 and erlang:resume/1.
 1368: suspend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1369:     ct:timetrap({minutes,2}),
 1370:     Worker = fun_spawn(fun worker/0),
 1371:     %% Suspend a process and test that it is suspended.
 1372:     ok = do_suspend(Worker, 10000),
 1373:     ok.
 1374: 
 1375: do_suspend(_Pid, 0) ->
 1376:     ok;
 1377: do_suspend(Pid, N) ->
 1378:     %% Suspend a process and test that it is suspended.
 1379:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Pid),
 1380:     {status, suspended} = process_info(Pid, status),
 1381: 
 1382:     %% Unsuspend the process and make sure it starts working.
 1383:     true = erlang:resume_process(Pid),
 1384:     case process_info(Pid, status) of
 1385:         {status, runnable} -> ok;
 1386:         {status, running} -> ok;
 1387:         {status, garbage_collecting} -> ok;
 1388:         ST -> ct:fail(ST)
 1389:     end,
 1390:     erlang:yield(),
 1391:     do_suspend(Pid, N-1).
 1392: 
 1393: suspend_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1394:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 2}),
 1395:     rand:seed(exsplus, {4711,17,4711}),
 1396:     do_suspend_exit(5000),
 1397:     ok.
 1398: 
 1399: do_suspend_exit(0) ->
 1400:     ok;
 1401: do_suspend_exit(N) ->
 1402:     Work = rand:uniform(50),
 1403:     Parent = self(),
 1404:     {Suspendee, Mon2}
 1405:     = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 1406:                             suspend_exit_work(Work),
 1407:                             exit(normal)
 1408:                     end),
 1409:     {Suspender, Mon1}
 1410:     = spawn_monitor(
 1411:         fun () ->
 1412:                 suspend_exit_work(Work div 2),
 1413:                 Parent ! {doing_suspend, self()},
 1414:                 case catch erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee) of
 1415:                     {'EXIT', _} ->
 1416:                         ok;
 1417:                     true ->
 1418:                         erlang:resume_process(Suspendee)
 1419:                 end
 1420:         end),
 1421:     receive
 1422:         {doing_suspend, Suspender} ->
 1423:             case N rem 2 of
 1424:                 0 -> exit(Suspender, bang);
 1425:                 1 -> ok
 1426:             end
 1427:     end,
 1428:     receive {'DOWN', Mon1, process, Suspender, _} -> ok end,
 1429:     receive {'DOWN', Mon2, process, Suspendee, _} -> ok end,
 1430:     do_suspend_exit(N-1).
 1431: 
 1432: 
 1433: 
 1434: 
 1435: suspend_exit_work(0) ->
 1436:     ok;
 1437: suspend_exit_work(N) ->
 1438:     process_info(self()),
 1439:     suspend_exit_work(N-1).
 1440: 
 1441: -define(CHK_SUSPENDED(P,B), chk_suspended(P, B, ?LINE)).
 1442: 
 1443: chk_suspended(P, Bool, Line) ->
 1444:     {Bool, Line} = {({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)), Line}.
 1445: 
 1446: suspender_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1447:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 3}),
 1448:     P1 = spawn_link(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 1449:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch erlang:resume_process(P1)),
 1450:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(
 1451:                  fun () ->
 1452:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false),
 1453:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1454:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1455:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1456:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1457:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1458:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1459:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1460:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1461:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1462:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1463:                          erlang:resume_process(P1),
 1464:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false),
 1465:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1466:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1467:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1468:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1469:                          exit(bang)
 1470:                  end),
 1471:     receive
 1472:         {'DOWN', M2,process,P2,R2} ->
 1473:             bang = R2,
 1474:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false)
 1475:     end,
 1476:     Parent = self(),
 1477:     {P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(
 1478:                  fun () ->
 1479:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1480:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1481:                          Parent ! self(),
 1482:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1483:                  end),
 1484:     {P4, M4} = spawn_monitor(
 1485:                  fun () ->
 1486:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1487:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1488:                          Parent ! self(),
 1489:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1490:                  end),
 1491:     {P5, M5} = spawn_monitor(
 1492:                  fun () ->
 1493:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1494:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1495:                          Parent ! self(),
 1496:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1497:                  end),
 1498:     {P6, M6} = spawn_monitor(
 1499:                  fun () ->
 1500:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1501:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1502:                          Parent ! self(),
 1503:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1504:                  end),
 1505:     {P7, M7} = spawn_monitor(
 1506:                  fun () ->
 1507:                          erlang:suspend_process(P1),
 1508:                          ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1509:                          Parent ! self(),
 1510:                          receive after infinity -> ok end
 1511:                  end),
 1512:     receive P3 -> ok end,
 1513:     receive P4 -> ok end,
 1514:     receive P5 -> ok end,
 1515:     receive P6 -> ok end,
 1516:     receive P7 -> ok end,
 1517:     ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true),
 1518:     exit(P3, bang),
 1519:     receive
 1520:         {'DOWN',M3,process,P3,R3} ->
 1521:             bang = R3,
 1522:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1523:     end,
 1524:     exit(P4, bang),
 1525:     receive
 1526:         {'DOWN',M4,process,P4,R4} ->
 1527:             bang = R4,
 1528:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1529:     end,
 1530:     exit(P5, bang),
 1531:     receive
 1532:         {'DOWN',M5,process,P5,R5} ->
 1533:             bang = R5,
 1534:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1535:     end,
 1536:     exit(P6, bang),
 1537:     receive
 1538:         {'DOWN',M6,process,P6,R6} ->
 1539:             bang = R6,
 1540:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, true)
 1541:     end,
 1542:     exit(P7, bang),
 1543:     receive
 1544:         {'DOWN',M7,process,P7,R7} ->
 1545:             bang = R7,
 1546:             ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P1, false)
 1547:     end,
 1548:     unlink(P1),
 1549:     exit(P1, bong),
 1550:     ok.
 1551: 
 1552: suspend_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1553:     case os:getenv("ERL_EXTREME_TESTING") of
 1554:         "true" ->
 1555:             ct:timetrap({minutes, 3*60}),
 1556:             P = spawn_link(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 1557:             suspend_until_system_limit(P),
 1558:             unlink(P),
 1559:             exit(P, bye),
 1560:             ok;
 1561:         _ ->
 1562:             {skip, "Takes too long time for normal testing"}
 1563:     end.
 1564: 
 1565: suspend_until_system_limit(P) ->
 1566:     suspend_until_system_limit(P, 0, 0).
 1567: 
 1568: suspend_until_system_limit(P, N, M) ->
 1569:     NewM = case M of
 1570:                1 ->
 1571:                    ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P, true), 2;
 1572:                1000000 ->
 1573:                    erlang:display(N), 1;
 1574:                _ ->
 1575:                    M+1
 1576:            end,
 1577:     case catch erlang:suspend_process(P) of
 1578:         true ->
 1579:             suspend_until_system_limit(P, N+1, NewM);
 1580:         {'EXIT', R} when R == system_limit;
 1581:                          element(1, R) == system_limit ->
 1582:             io:format("system limit at ~p~n", [N]),
 1583:             resume_from_system_limit(P, N, 0);
 1584:         Error ->
 1585:             ct:fail(Error)
 1586:     end.
 1587: 
 1588: resume_from_system_limit(P, 0, _) ->
 1589:     ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P, false),
 1590:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch erlang:resume_process(P)),
 1591:     ok;
 1592: resume_from_system_limit(P, N, M) ->
 1593:     NewM = case M of
 1594:                1 ->
 1595:                    ?CHK_SUSPENDED(P, true), 2;
 1596:                1000000 ->
 1597:                    erlang:display(N), 1;
 1598:                _ ->
 1599:                    M+1
 1600:            end,
 1601:     erlang:resume_process(P),
 1602:     resume_from_system_limit(P, N-1, NewM).
 1603: 
 1604: -record(susp_info, {async = 0,
 1605:                     dbl_async = 0,
 1606:                     synced = 0,
 1607:                     async_once = 0}).
 1608: 
 1609: suspend_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1610:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 3}),
 1611:     Self = self(),
 1612:     wait_for_empty_runq(10),
 1613:     Tok = spawn_link(fun () ->
 1614:                              Self ! self(),
 1615:                              tok_trace_loop(Self, 0, 1000000000)
 1616:                      end),
 1617:     TC = 1000,
 1618:     receive Tok -> ok end,
 1619:     SF = fun (N, #susp_info {async = A,
 1620:                              dbl_async = AA,
 1621:                              synced = S,
 1622:                              async_once = AO} = Acc) ->
 1623:                  Tag = {make_ref(), self()},
 1624:                  erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [{asynchronous, Tag}]),
 1625:                  Res = case {suspend_count(Tok), N rem 4} of
 1626:                            {0, 2} ->
 1627:                                erlang:suspend_process(Tok,
 1628:                                                       [asynchronous]),
 1629:                                case suspend_count(Tok) of
 1630:                                    2 ->
 1631:                                        erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1632:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1};
 1633:                                    0 ->
 1634:                                        erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1635:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1,
 1636:                                                      dbl_async = AA+1}
 1637:                                end;
 1638:                            {0, 1} ->
 1639:                                erlang:suspend_process(Tok,
 1640:                                                       [asynchronous,
 1641:                                                        unless_suspending]),
 1642:                                case suspend_count(Tok) of
 1643:                                    1 ->
 1644:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1};
 1645:                                    0 ->
 1646:                                        Acc#susp_info{async = A+1,
 1647:                                                      async_once = AO+1}
 1648:                                end;
 1649:                            {0, 0} ->
 1650:                                erlang:suspend_process(Tok,
 1651:                                                       [unless_suspending]),
 1652:                                1 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1653:                                Acc#susp_info{async = A+1,
 1654:                                              synced = S+1};
 1655:                            {0, _} ->
 1656:                                Acc#susp_info{async = A+1};
 1657:                            _ ->
 1658:                                Acc
 1659:                        end,
 1660:                  receive
 1661:                      {Tag, Result} ->
 1662:                          suspended = Result,
 1663:                          erlang:resume_process(Tok)
 1664:                  end,
 1665:                  erlang:yield(),
 1666:                  Res
 1667:          end,
 1668:     SI = repeat_acc(SF, TC, #susp_info{}),
 1669:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [asynchronous]),
 1670:     %% Verify that it eventually suspends
 1671:     WaitTime0 = 20,
 1672:     WaitTime1 = WaitTime0 *
 1673:         case erlang:system_info(emu_type) of
 1674:             debug -> 2;
 1675:             gcov -> 2;
 1676:             asan -> 2;
 1677:             valgrind -> 10;
 1678:             _ -> 1
 1679:         end,
 1680:     WaitTime2 = WaitTime1 *
 1681:         case erlang:system_info(lock_checking) of
 1682:             true -> 5;
 1683:             false -> 1
 1684:         end,
 1685:     WaitTime = WaitTime2 *
 1686:         case {erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 1687:               erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 1688:             {Schdlrs, CPUs} when is_integer(CPUs),
 1689:                                  Schdlrs =< CPUs ->
 1690:                 1;
 1691:             _ ->
 1692:                 10
 1693:         end,
 1694:     receive after WaitTime -> ok end,
 1695:     1 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1696:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [asynchronous]),
 1697:     2 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1698:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [asynchronous]),
 1699:     3 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1700:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok),
 1701:     4 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1702:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok),
 1703:     5 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1704:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [unless_suspending]),
 1705:     5 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1706:     erlang:suspend_process(Tok, [unless_suspending,
 1707:                                  asynchronous]),
 1708:     5 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1709:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1710:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1711:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1712:     erlang:resume_process(Tok),
 1713:     1 = suspend_count(Tok),
 1714:     io:format("Main suspends: ~p~n"
 1715:               "Main async: ~p~n"
 1716:               "Double async: ~p~n"
 1717:               "Async once: ~p~n"
 1718:               "Synced: ~p~n",
 1719:               [TC,
 1720:                SI#susp_info.async,
 1721:                SI#susp_info.dbl_async,
 1722:                SI#susp_info.async_once,
 1723:                SI#susp_info.synced]),
 1724:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 1725:         1 ->
 1726:             ok;
 1727:         _ ->
 1728:             true = SI#susp_info.async =/= 0
 1729:     end,
 1730:     unlink(Tok),
 1731:     exit(Tok, bang),
 1732:     ok.
 1733: 
 1734: suspend_count(Suspendee) ->
 1735:     suspend_count(self(), Suspendee).
 1736: 
 1737: suspend_count(Suspender, Suspendee) ->
 1738:     {suspending, SList} = process_info(Suspender, suspending),
 1739: 
 1740:     case lists:keysearch(Suspendee, 1, SList) of
 1741:         {value, {_Suspendee, 0, 0}} ->
 1742:             ct:fail({bad_suspendee_list, SList});
 1743:         {value, {Suspendee, Count, 0}} when is_integer(Count), Count > 0 ->
 1744:             {status, suspended} = process_info(Suspendee, status),
 1745:             Count;
 1746:         {value, {Suspendee, 0, Outstanding}} when is_integer(Outstanding),
 1747:                                                   Outstanding > 0 ->
 1748:             0;
 1749:         false ->
 1750:             0;
 1751:         Error ->
 1752:             ct:fail({bad_suspendee_list, Error, SList})
 1753:     end.
 1754: 
 1755: repeat_acc(Fun, N, Acc) ->
 1756:     repeat_acc(Fun, 0, N, Acc).
 1757: 
 1758: repeat_acc(_Fun, N, N, Acc) ->
 1759:     Acc;
 1760: repeat_acc(Fun, N, M, Acc) ->
 1761:     repeat_acc(Fun, N+1, M, Fun(N, Acc)).
 1762: 
 1763: %% Tests that waiting process can be suspended
 1764: %% (bug in R2D and earlier; see OTP-1488).
 1765: 
 1766: %% Test that a waiting process can be suspended.
 1767: suspend_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1768:     Process = fun_spawn(fun process/0),
 1769:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1770:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Process),
 1771:     {status, suspended} = process_info(Process, status),
 1772:     ok.
 1773: 
 1774: 
 1775: %% Test that trace(new, true, ...) is cleared when tracer dies.
 1776: new_clear(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1777:     Tracer = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
 1778: 
 1779:     0 = erlang_trace(new, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 1780:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
 1781:     {tracer, Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
 1782:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Tracer),
 1783:     true = exit(Tracer, done),
 1784:     receive
 1785:         {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok
 1786:     end,
 1787:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
 1788:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
 1789:     ok.
 1790: 
 1791: 
 1792: 
 1793: %% Test that trace(all, false, ...) works without tracer.
 1794: existing_clear(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1795:     Self = self(),
 1796: 
 1797:     Tracer = proplists:get_value(receiver, Config),
 1798:     N = erlang_trace(existing, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 1799:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Self, flags),
 1800:     {tracer, Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(Self, tracer),
 1801:     M = erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
 1802:     io:format("Started trace on ~p processes and stopped on ~p~n", 
 1803:               [N, M]),
 1804:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(Self, flags),
 1805:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(Self, tracer),
 1806:     M = N, % Used to be N + 1, but from 19.0 the tracer is also traced
 1807: 
 1808:     ok.
 1809: 
 1810: %% Test that erlang:trace/3 can be called on processes where the
 1811: %% tracer has died. OTP-13928
 1812: tracer_die(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1813:     Proc = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1814: 
 1815:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1816:     timer:sleep(1),
 1817:     N = erlang_trace(existing, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 1818:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, flags),
 1819:     {tracer, Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, tracer),
 1820:     unlink(Tracer),
 1821:     exit(Tracer, die),
 1822: 
 1823:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1824:     timer:sleep(1),
 1825:     N = erlang_trace(existing, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer2}]),
 1826:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, flags),
 1827:     {tracer, Tracer2} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, tracer),
 1828:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1829:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1830: 
 1831:     Tracer3 = spawn_link(fun receiver/0),
 1832:     timer:sleep(1),
 1833:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc, true, [send, {tracer, Tracer3}]),
 1834:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, flags),
 1835:     {tracer, Tracer3} = erlang_trace_info(Proc, tracer),
 1836:     unlink(Tracer3),
 1837:     exit(Tracer3, die),
 1838: 
 1839:     ok.
 1840: 
 1841: %% Test that an invalid flag cause badarg
 1842: bad_flag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1843:     %% A bad flag could deadlock the SMP emulator in erts-5.5
 1844:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch erlang_trace(new,
 1845:                                                 true,
 1846:                                                 [not_a_valid_flag])),
 1847: 
 1848:     %% Leaks of {tracer,_} in OTP 23.2
 1849:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive die -> ok end end),
 1850:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [{tracer, self()},
 1851:                                  {tracer, self()}]),
 1852:     Pid ! die,
 1853:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
 1854:         (catch erlang_trace(new, true, [{tracer, self()}
 1855:                                         | improper])),
 1856:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} =
 1857:         (catch erlang_trace(new, true, [{tracer, self()},
 1858:                                         not_a_valid_flag])),
 1859:     ok.
 1860: 
 1861: %% Test erlang:trace_delivered/1
 1862: trace_delivered(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1863:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 1864:     TokLoops = 10000,
 1865:     Go = make_ref(),
 1866:     Parent = self(),
 1867:     Tok = spawn(fun () ->
 1868:                         receive Go -> gone end,
 1869:                         tok_trace_loop(Parent, 0, TokLoops)
 1870:                 end),
 1871:     1 = erlang_trace(Tok, true, [procs]),
 1872:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, Tok),
 1873:     NoOfTraceMessages = 4*TokLoops + 1,
 1874:     io:format("Expect a total of ~p trace messages~n",
 1875:               [NoOfTraceMessages]),
 1876:     Tok ! Go,
 1877:     NoOfTraceMessages = drop_trace_until_down(Tok, Mon),
 1878:     receive
 1879:         Msg ->
 1880:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg})
 1881:     after 1000 ->
 1882:               ok
 1883:     end.
 1884: 
 1885: %% This testcase checks that receive trace works on exit signal messages
 1886: %% when the sender of the exit signal is the process itself.
 1887: trap_exit_self_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1888:     Parent = self(),
 1889:     Proc = spawn_link(fun() -> process(Parent) end),
 1890: 
 1891:     1 = erlang_trace(Proc, true, ['receive']),
 1892:     Proc ! {trap_exit_please, true},
 1893:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {trap_exit_please, true}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1894: 
 1895:     %% Make the process call exit(self(), signal)
 1896:     Reason1 = make_ref(),
 1897:     Proc ! {exit_signal_please, Reason1},
 1898:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {exit_signal_please, Reason1}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1899:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {'EXIT', Proc, Reason1}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1900:     receive {Proc, {'EXIT', Proc, Reason1}} -> ok end,
 1901:     receive_nothing(),
 1902: 
 1903:     unlink(Proc),
 1904:     Reason2 = make_ref(),
 1905:     Proc ! {exit_please, Reason2},
 1906:     {trace, Proc, 'receive', {exit_please, Reason2}} = receive_first_trace(),
 1907:     receive_nothing(),
 1908:     ok.
 1909: 
 1910: trace_info_badarg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1911:     catch erlang_trace_info({a,b,c},d),
 1912:     ok.
 1913: 
 1914: %% An incoming suspend monitor down wasn't handled
 1915: %% correct when the local monitor half had been
 1916: %% removed with an emulator crash as result.
 1917: erl_704(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1918:     erl_704_test(100).
 1919: 
 1920: erl_704_test(0) ->
 1921:     ok;
 1922: erl_704_test(N) ->
